topic.title: Link contacts and suppliers
topic.shortdesc: GLPI allows to link contacts and suppliers

body.p: The difference is clearly established between a supplier, which is possible to link in a one-to-one relation with inventory elements, and between contacts, which composes person list allowing relationship with this supplier. To feed this list, contacts must be linked to the concerned supplier.
body.example: Mister Smith is a sales representative at company Acme from which the structure is getting goods on a regular basis. Create a supplier called Acme. Create a contact named Mister Smith. Assign to this contact the sales representative. And link this contact to supplier Acme.
